title: Rafael Cuevas
text:
Rafael Cuevas Sánchez (born June 16, 1980) is a retired <a href="Mexican%20people">Mexican</a> <a href="Association%20football">football</a> <a href="Goalkeeper%20%28association%20football%29">goalkeeper</a>. He is currently the goalkeeper coach for <a href="Club%20America">Club America</a>'s first team under <a href="Ricardo%20LaVolpe">Ricardo LaVolpe</a>.
He is known to teammates and fans as "Higuita", due to his resemblance to <a href="Colombia%20national%20football%20team">Colombian</a> <a href="Goalkeeper%20%28association%20football%29">goalkeeper</a> <a href="Ren%C3%A9%20Higuita">René Higuita</a>.
